timeline.bodyText: is "integer" the right term to describe a smallint/integer/bigint types?
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integer column. (:issue:`4200`)

timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integer column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)
+* Fix Azure ADL caching support. (:issue:`4240`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add hidden ``$partition`` column to partitioned table. (:issue:`3582`)

timeline.bodyText: How about "legacy" here rather than non-compliant
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision

replies.bodyText: I wanted to make emphasis on the fact that they shouldn't have hardcoded those assumptions, but I'll update as suggested.
replies.author: martint

timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)

timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)
+* Fix handling of strings when translating Hive views. (:issue:`3266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)

timeline.bodyText:
We can shorten this to

Add support for setting column comments.

Since the main item contains the syntax. And in the future releases, we would not mention the syntax when a connector adds support.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:

+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)

+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------

+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------

+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)

+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)

timeline.bodyText: Add hidden ``$partition`` column for partitioned tables that contains the partition name.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)
+* Fix handling of strings when translating Hive views. (:issue:`3266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)
+* Fix Azure ADL caching support. (:issue:`4240`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Expose hidden ``$partition`` column to partitioned tables. (:issue:`3582`)

timeline.bodyText: Fix type mapping for unsigned integer types.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)
+* Fix handling of strings when translating Hive views. (:issue:`3266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)
+* Fix Azure ADL caching support. (:issue:`4240`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Expose hidden ``$partition`` column to partitioned tables. (:issue:`3582`)
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when a column is projected and also referenced in a query predicate
+  when reading from Kafka topic using ``RAW`` decoder. (:issue:`4183`)
+
+MySQL Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix type mapping for unsigned integer types in MySQL connector. (:issue:`4187`)

timeline.bodyText: Exclude internal schemas (e.g., sys) from schema listings.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)
+* Fix handling of strings when translating Hive views. (:issue:`3266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)
+* Fix Azure ADL caching support. (:issue:`4240`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Expose hidden ``$partition`` column to partitioned tables. (:issue:`3582`)
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when a column is projected and also referenced in a query predicate
+  when reading from Kafka topic using ``RAW`` decoder. (:issue:`4183`)
+
+MySQL Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix type mapping for unsigned integer types in MySQL connector. (:issue:`4187`)
+
+Oracle Connector Changes
+------------------------
+
+* Filter internal objects (e.g. ``sys``) when listing schemas. (:issue:`3784`)

timeline.bodyText: Exclude the underlying database's ``information_schema`` from schema listings.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+=========================
+Release 338 (XX Jul 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix incorrect results when joining tables on a masked column. (:issue:`4251`)
+* Fix planning failure when multiple columns have a mask. (:issue:`4322`)
+* Fix incorrect comparison for ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values with precision larger than 3. (:issue:`4305`)
+* Fix incorrect rounding for timestamps before 1970-01-01. (:issue:`4370`)
+* Fix query failure when using ``VALUES`` with a ``real`` or ``double`` ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4119`)
+* Fix query failure when joining tables on a ``real`` or ``double`` column and one of the joined tables
+  contains ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4272`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when Parquet file has no min/max statistics for an integral column. (:issue:`4200`)
+* Fix unauthorized error for internal requests to management endpoints. (:issue:`4304`)
+* Fix memory leak while using dynamic filtering. (:issue:`4228`)
+* Improve dynamic partition pruning for broadcast joins. (:issue:`4262`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Add compatibility mode for non-compliant clients when rendering datetime type names with default precision
+  in ``information_schema`` tables. This can be enabled via the ``deprecated.omit-datetime-type-precision``
+  configuration property or ``omit_datetime_type_precision`` session property. (:issue:`4349`, :issue:`4377`)
+* Enforce ``NOT NULL`` column declarations when writing data. (:issue:`4144`)
+
+JDBC Driver Changes
+-------------------
+
+* Fix excessive CPU usage when reading query results. (:issue:`3928`)
+* Implement DatabaseMetaData#getClientInfoProperties. (:issue:`4318`)
+
+Elasticsearch Connector Changes
+-------------------------------
+
+* Add support for reading numeric values encoded as strings. (:issue:`4341`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when reading from a table partitioned on a ``real`` or ``double`` column containing
+  a ``NaN`` value. (:issue:`4266`)
+* Fix sporadic failure when writing to bucketed sorted tables on S3. (:issue:`2296`)
+* Fix handling of strings when translating Hive views. (:issue:`3266`)
+* Do not require caching directories to be configured on coordinator. (:issue:`3987`, :issue:`4280`)
+* Fix Azure ADL caching support. (:issue:`4240`)
+* Add support for setting column comments via the ``COMMENT ON COLUMN`` syntax. (:issue:`2516`)
+* Expose hidden ``$partition`` column to partitioned tables. (:issue:`3582`)
+
+Kafka Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix query failure when a column is projected and also referenced in a query predicate
+  when reading from Kafka topic using ``RAW`` decoder. (:issue:`4183`)
+
+MySQL Connector Changes
+-----------------------
+
+* Fix type mapping for unsigned integer types in MySQL connector. (:issue:`4187`)
+
+Oracle Connector Changes
+------------------------
+
+* Filter internal objects (e.g. ``sys``) when listing schemas. (:issue:`3784`)
+* Add support for connection pooling. (:issue:`3770`)
+
+Base-JDBC Connector Library Changes
+-----------------------------------
+
+* Filter objects on hidden schemas when listing tables. (:issue:`3834`)
